name: Paywall
description:
Become a thief.

You are in an open environment and try to get some money with some "honest" work. Explore different houses and commit your job.

In that game you can earn money by stealing things. If you steal something the police might look for you and that will be represented with the clock on the right side. You need to avoid the white view areas of the police.

You can travel around by the train or subway. If you don't have any lifes left your money will be set to 0 again. You can interact with object in the scene by pressing the left mouse button or firebutton1 and its green marked.
